SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: MAINTAIN LIBRARY FOR RESEARCH AND STUDY OF FURNITURE MANUFACTURE AND DESIGN
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDY OF FURNITURE DESIGN

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: ANNUAL FURNITURE AND INTERIOR DESIGN COMPETITION EACH REQUIRE AN ENTRY FORM. THE FURNITURE DESIGN REQUIRES A COMPETITION DESIGN, SCALED DRAWINGS, IDEATION THUMBNAILS, ETC ALL IN PDF FORMAT. THE INTERIOR DESIGN REQUIRES A DESIGN BRIEF, CONCEPT STATEMENT, SPACE PLANS, INTERIOR RENDERINGS AND MATERIAL/COLOR BOARDS, ETC. IN PDF FORMAT. THE ENTRY FORMS AND RULES ARE LOCATED ON THE WEBSITE WWW.FURNITURELIBRARY.COM
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: OPEN TO STUDENTS OF FURNITURE OR INTERIOR DESIGN PROGRAMS. NO GEOGRAPHICAL LIMITS.

DepreciationPropertyGrp.PropertyDesc: PIN & INK ORG DR CS GRAY
